data.name: بی ای تی پارس
data.description: British American Tobacco is a leading tobacco company founded in 1902. We are the worlds second largest quoted tobacco group by global market share, with over 200 brands sold in over 200 markets. BAT has more than 50,000 employees worldwide with factories in 41 countries.  BAT Pars was founded in Iran in 2003, and has since expanded its market presence by 4 drive brands which are: Dunhill, Kent, Pall Mall and Montana. In 2016 we established our independent factory in Iran.
